text: Frank Dean Lucas (born January 6, 1960) is an American politician. He is the U.S. representative for since 2003. He represented the 6th district before from 1994 to 2003. He is a member of the Republican Party. In April 2014, Lucas introduced the Customer Protection and End User Relief Act (H.R. 4413; 113th Congress) into the House. ==References== ==Other websites== * Congressman Frank Lucas official U.S. House website * Frank Lucas for Congress * * * Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Oklahoma Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Frank Lucas (Oklahoma politician)
